article_title: GOP senators should stop dithering on hearing for Merrick Garland as Supreme Court justice
article_text:
GOP senators should hold a hearing on President Obama’s nominee

Merrick Garland is a qualified replacement for Antonin Scalia

Republicans’ delay tactics could come back to bite them in 2017

article_metadata.title: GOP senators should stop dithering on hearing for Merrick Garland as Supreme Court justice | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Senate Republicans should be kicking themselves for taking such a hard line on filling the U.S. Supreme Court vacancy left by the death of conservative Justice Antonin Scalia. That position is a lot less attractive, with Donald Trump the presumptive Republican presidential nominee and Hillary Clinton on the Democratic side.
og.title: GOP senators should stop dithering on hearing for Merrick Garland as Supreme Court justice
